title: Executive Order 3439-Record of War Agencies Transferred
content: The War Department is hereby directed to take over the records of the following organizations: Council of National Defense; War Industries Board; Committee on Public Information; War Labor Board.
citation: Warren G. Harding, Executive Order 3439-Record of War Agencies Transferred Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/329250
